name: QLThumbnailRepresentation
desc: Information about the thumbnail that the thumbnail generator returns.

items.name: var cgImage: CGImage
items.desc: A thumbnail in the form of a Core Graphics image object.

items.name: var nsImage: NSImage
items.desc: A thumbnail in the form of an AppKit image object.

items.name: var uiImage: UIImage
items.desc: A thumbnail in the form of a UIKit image object.

items.name: var contentRect: CGRect
items.desc: The rectangle within the thumbnail image of the document that represents its contents.

items.name: enum QLThumbnailRepresentation.RepresentationType
items.desc: The different types of thumbnails that you can create.
